shows.title: Antichrist & UFOs / Consciousness Beyond Death
shows.first_half: First Half: Stan Deyo is a self-educated physicist who specializes in advanced propulsion methods for spacecraft and marine craft. He'll discuss a variety of topics, including the Antichrist, the Rapture, UFOs, and the Ukraine/Russia conflict.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author and near-death experiencer Peter Panagore will present his research and work on the journey into consciousness beyond death, mysticism across global traditions, and his encounters with the unexplained. Peter will bridge ancient mystical teachings with modern understandings of reality to demonstrate how the mystical and paranormal are intertwined.

shows.title: Alternative Fuel / Grief & Healing
shows.first_half: First Half: David Blume is a speaker, inventor, and researcher who has decades of experience at the cutting edge of regenerative agricultural technology. He'll share information on how people can make their own inexpensive, pollution-free fuel for vehicles and generators.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author and grief coach Lindsay Stanton discusses her belief that we are all energy that never dies, and through this everlasting connection, we have the opportunity to transform our grief into deep healing. There are opportunities for connection and love after the loss of the human body, she says, and we can expand and heal in a beautiful way.

shows.title: Star Systems & Ancient Cultures / George's Birthday Open Lines
shows.first_half: First Half:  Ancient astronaut theorist, author, and researcher Jason Martell will explore why ancient cultures often referenced Sirius, the Pleiades, and Orion, and how these star systems align with legends of gods on Earth and megalithic sites worldwide. He'll also share information on ancient civilizations and traditions.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Join us for a special edition of Open Lines as we celebrate George Noory's birthday with your calls.

shows.title: Holistic Health / Exploring Paranormal Beliefs
shows.first_half: First Half: Alphonzo Monzo is a naturopathic doctor who views the body holistically, in which all parts are interrelated and should be considered as a whole for true health and wellness to be achieved. He'll discuss the body's electromagnetic communication system and the tools available to combat health problems.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Freelance journalist Matthew Hongoltz-Hetling brings us his research and experience gathered on his two-year exploration of how the American public's growing belief in ghosts, aliens, Bigfoot, spirits, and other paranormal phenomena is impacting society as a whole.

shows.title: Inducing Out-of-Body Experiences / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Graham Nicholls is an English author, as well as a lecturer and advisory board member for The Rhine Research Center. He'll discuss his unique approach to inducing out-of-body experiences, from immersion, flow states, sensory deprivation, to infra-liminal sound, and some of the most extraordinary, verified experiences on record. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half.
